metadata.name: luczak-personal-and-consulting-design-contract
metadata.description: Authoritative visual and brand system for Łukasz Piotr Łuczak (personal brand) and Luczak Consulting (company brand) for a digital business card platform with light/dark modes and Tailwind CSS implementation.

brand-consulting-primary.intent: Primary actions, active navigation, key highlights

must: All colors must meet accessibility contrast requirements.
Personal red must not be used for primary system actions.
Consulting yellow must not be used in personal-only contexts.
Personal red and consulting yellow must never appear together in the same primary action.
mustNot: Do not use personal red for primary system actions.
Do not use consulting yellow in personal-only contexts.
Do not combine personal red and consulting yellow in the same primary action.

must: Inter must be used for all body text and UI controls.
Base font size must be 16px (text-base).
Line height must be relaxed (leading-relaxed).
may: Space Grotesk may be used only for headlines and section titles.
mustNot: Decorative or display fonts must not be used.
Headings must not use ultra-bold weights.
Hard or sharp shadows must not be used.

must: Blur must always be paired with a subtle border.
Only the system spacing scale is allowed.
mustNot: Arbitrary spacing values must not be used.

must: Tabs must contain icon + label.
Active tab must use consulting primary color.
State changes must be expressed via background and contrast.
mustNot: Underline-only indicators must not be used.

must: Primary button must use consulting yellow background with dark text.
Secondary button must use transparent background with a visible border.
mustNot: Personal red must not be used for primary system actions.
Buttons must not rely on color alone for state indication.

must: Cards must use glass surfaces.
Content order must be: title → content → actions.
mustNot: Cards must not contain decorative gradients.

must: Shape must be circular.
Image must be high-contrast.
may: A personal red ring may be used only for personal-brand contexts.

notes: Text must not be placed directly on glass without sufficient contrast.

must: Focus states must be clearly visible and consistent.
Visible focus indicators on all interactive elements.
Interactive states must not rely solely on color.
Buttons must not rely on color alone for state indication.
